attributes.action: Abolish the present Council Tax system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the majority of the Democratic United Kingdom lawfully request the removal of the current Council Tax system. If you fail to represent the majority your party will be acting unlawfully which legally permits revolution / civil disobedience

rejection.details: We cannot accept petitions which call for or may incite unlawful behaviour.
reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
